hello again it's so nice to see you it
really does seem like it was only a
short while ago that you and i were
talking here in this virtual space
about how it was only a short while ago
that we were here in this virtual space
and here we are again
we're still it's hard to say things are
different
the last time we met i was at rancher
now i'm at susa
even though that sounds different
rancher susa the things that matter
they aren't any different at all this is
kubecon this is the event where we get
to meet and talk to you
hear your stories and understand what
you want from kubernetes and rancher
the fact that it's still virtual doesn't
get in the way of that for us and we've
packed this event with as much as we can
to make it successful for you
on may 4th the day before the official
event you can join us at kubernetes on
the edge day
here you can talk to us about what it
means to run workloads at the edge
and how kubernetes is one of the key
pillars of a successful edge strategy
we have five speaking sessions scheduled
for you on thursday
matt farina joined speakers from
microsoft and red hat to talk about how
the helm project turned challenges into
victories
together they'll share strategies that
you can use to persevere and triumph in
your own projects
also on thursday colleen murphy and a
speaker from red hat
will show you how to use the security
profiles operator to control linux
security features like app armor
sc linux and setcomp on friday flavio
castelli and rafael fernandez lopez will
introduce you to a new dynamic admission
controller for kubernetes that uses web
assembly for fast validation and
mutation of requests
xiang is here to show you the future of
hyper-converged infrastructure with
harvester
one of the most exciting open source
projects that we're working on our
keynote is being delivered by dr thomas
giacomo and in it you'll learn about the
open source projects that susa is
bringing to market
and how companies are using susa and
rancher solutions as a springboard
for their own open source contributions
in their respective industries
of course we're also at the booth and
we're eager to chat with you and to
answer your questions
if you're a developer or in operations
if you're new to kubernetes or if you're
a master
we've got something to show you there's
also swag and giveaways
so come on by and say hello sousa
believes in the power of many
we believe in open source we believe in
innovating everywhere
we believe that everyone has the power
within themselves to succeed
and we believe that we have a role to
play in the success of others
we believe that humanity has the power
to overcome any adversity if we only
work together
we believe that tomorrow will be better
than today we believe in the future
and we believe in you we'll see you at
